title: Wednesday night football - West Springfield plays host to Fairfax
body: High school football is officially back, and with an interesting season, there will be interesting schedules to go with it. Tonight, it was Wednesday night football, and West Springfield high school played host to Fairfax.It was senior night at West Springfield, which started their season off strong last week with a 40-0 win over Justice. Fairfax also started their season on the right foot beat Oakton last Monday 18-8.Tonight West Springfield took advantage of that home-field advantage with a 35-14 win over Fairfax.
